decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: 

Flood Risk Assessment and Surface Water Drainage Statement (Dated July 2021), Appendix A (Harrow Council SuDS Proforma), Appendix B (Proposed Development Layout) Appendix C (Thames Water Asset Map), Appendix D (Existing Surface Water Runoff Calculations), Appendix E (Proposed Surface Water Drainage Calculations), Appendix F (Surface Water Drainage Strategy Plan), 3D Concept Design Board 1 (Vs 3 Dated 21/06/2021), Proposed Retaining Wall Structural Details (S01 Rev D), Topographical Survey (TS20-074-2 Sheet 2 of 2), Elevation Drawing 1 (Vs 2 Dated 24/06/2021), Surface Water Flood Zone 3A Overlay (2007630/002), Site Location Plan, Block Plan, Heritage Statement (Dated August 2021), AH2 - Accompanying Planning Document (Dated June 2021), Covering Letter (Dated 30/07/2021).

REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - The external surfaces of the development hereby approved shall be constructed in accordance with the details provided within AH2 - Accompanying Planning Document (Dated June 2021) and the submitted application form.

REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with Core Policies CS1.B and CS1.D of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policies DM1, DM6 and DM7 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 4 - All planting, seeding or turfing comprised in the approved scheme shall be carried out in the first planting and seeding seasons following the completion of the development.  Any existing or new trees or shrubs which, within a period of 5 years from the completion of the development, die, are removed, or become seriously damaged or diseased, shall be replaced in the next planting season, with others of a similar size and species, unless the local authority agrees any variation in writing.

REASON: To safeguard the appearance and character of the area, and to enhance the appearance of the development in accordance with Core Policies CS1.B and CS1.D of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policies DM1, DM6, DM7 and DM22 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 5 - The swimming pool and hot tub hereby permitted shall not be installed until works for the disposal of sewage have been provided on site in accordance with details to be submitted to, and approved in writing by, the local planning authority.  The development shall be carried out in accordance with details as so approved and shall thereafter be retained.

REASON: To ensure that adequate drainage facilities are provided in accordance with Policy CS1.W of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy SI 13 of the London Plan (2021), and Policy DM10 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 6 - The swimming pool and hot tub hereby permitted shall not be installed until works for the disposal of surface water and water attenuation/storage works have provided on site in accordance with details to be submitted to, and approved in writing by, the local planning authority. The development shall be carried out in accordance with details as so approved and shall thereafter be retained.

REASON: To ensure that adequate drainage facilities are provided and to prevent the increased risk of flooding in accordance with Policies CS1.U, CS1.W of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policies SI 12, SI 13 of the London Plan (2021), and Policy DM10 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Installation of swimming pool and hot tub with ancilliary equipment; hard and soft landscaping of the rear garden
